If you don't like .rar files don't download. Besides what is so hard about unpacking rar archives? For multiple files just select .001 file and unpack, winrar will automaticly unpack all the archives and you have the single extracted file. And another thing, almost 75% of the downloads go faster than when you download one big single file.

Thx for the upload.
I'll prefer a fast rar-download compare to a slow sigle file download anyday!
And I'll prefer a fast single download to a fast Rar download.

Unfortunately, whatever the reasoning the folks who insist on rar'ing have, the fact is that the chance of seeding is MUCH higher with a single file. Otherwise you have to use up DOUBLE your disk space - one version for viewing, one for seeding. I'm tight on space so only seed the single file versions.
